text: The Chandongcha Sports Club () is a North Korean football club based in Chongjin, North Hamgyong. They play in the DPR Korea League, the highest football soccer league in North Korea. The team came in first place in 1989. The team plays at Chandongcha Park.chandongja means "person who agrees" in korean. ==Achievements== *DPR Korea League: 1 :: 1989 Category:Football clubs in North Korea Category:Chongjin
title: Chandongja Sports Club
